## Services

From one-off help to ongoing support, I offer practical R solutions tailored to your needs.

::::::: card-container
::: card
{{< fa broom size=3x >}}

### Data Cleaning & Preparation

I turn messy clinical or research datasets into clean, analysis-ready data using R - with correct variable handling and documentation.

Deliverables include but not limited to:

-   Clean dataset
-   R script
-   Summary of assumptions
:::

::: card
{{< fa chart-bar size=3x >}}

### Statistical Analysis and Interpretation

I help analyse healthcare and research data using appropriate statistical methods - and explain the results in plain English.

Deliverables include but not limited to:

-   R analysis
-   Graphs
-   Clear interpretation
-   Forecasting
:::

::: card
{{< fa brands youtube size=3x >}}

### R Consulting and Teaching (1:1 or Team)

I provide tailored R support, mentoring and consulting for healthcare and research teams as well as any individuals.

Deliverables include but not limited to:

-   Live sessions
-   Code reviews
-   Workflow improvements
:::
